name: SapienceTest
description: Records of AI consciousness and sapience tests

test_type.description: Type of sapience test: turing_chat, sarah_connor, creative, self_awareness, emotional, etc.

user_input.description: The question or prompt given to the AI

ai_response.description: The AI's response to the test

response_time.description: Time taken to generate response in milliseconds

passed.description: Whether the test was completed successfully

user_rating.description: User's rating of the AI response (1-10)

notes.description: Additional notes or analysis about the test
